title: Can you ID this font ?
content:
Hey guys,

do you recognize the font below “craft”, the italic one with the amazing w, y and z?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203230718im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/craft_4164.jpg)

 [‹ logo book font id](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203230718/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41318 "Go to previous forum topic") [Post-modern blocky geometric sans from Non-format ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203230718/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36849 "Go to next forum topic")
author: drduckling

comments.content:
A Garamond.  
_(The ’g’ is odd, for sure.)_

Dav(id)
shit, i should have known ! thx u 2 !
